description: Try our easy to follow Bean Soup With Chorizo & Tomato recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Bean Soup With Chorizo & Tomato Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Fry chorizo in a small, non-stick frying pan until crisp. Ladle soup into serving bowls. Top with chorizo and drizzle with the parsley oil. Note: If preferred, the parsley purée can be strained through a clean Chux cloth before adding the oil.
